participant_1.background:
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
I collect cosplay props to bring my favorite characters to life.
My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

participant_2.background:
I get my exercise by working on the farm.
I'm afraid of disappointing my family.
i sing many songs.
i write fiction for fun.
i am a personal chef.

content.text: Hey!  I'm doing well, thanks for asking.  How about you?
I'm doing alright.  I'm a little bit stressed about school, but I'm managing.
I understand.  School can be tough.  Do you have any hobbies to help you relax?
I like to collect cosplay props.  It's a lot of fun to bring my favorite characters to life!
That sounds really cool!  I've always wanted to try cosplay, but I'm not very good at sewing.
It's not as hard as you might think!  There are a lot of tutorials online that can help you get started.
Maybe I'll give it a try!  Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem!  I'm always happy to help.
So, what's your favorite cosplay prop that you own?
I have a really cool replica of Thor's hammer.  It's really heavy, but it's a lot of fun to swing around!
That sounds awesome!  I bet it's really cool to see in person.
It is!  I love showing it off to people.
I'm sure you do.  It sounds like a really cool prop.
Thanks!  I'm glad you like it.
